XKRT
XKRT is a low-level tasking runtime system.

39 #ifndef __STREAM_INSTRUCTION_H__
40 # define __STREAM_INSTRUCTION_H__
41 
42 # include <xkrt/callback.h>
43 # include <xkrt/consts.h>
44 # include <xkrt/memory/view.hpp>
45 # include <xkrt/driver/stream-instruction-type.h>
46 # include <xkrt/logger/todo.h>

48 # include <xkrt/sync/mutex.h>

52 XKRT_NAMESPACE_BEGIN
53 
54  /* counter for the stream queues */
55  typedef uint32_t stream_instruction_counter_t;
56 
57  /* move data between devices */
58  typedef struct stream_instruction_copy_1D_t
59  {
60  size_t size;
61  uintptr_t dst_device_addr;
62  uintptr_t src_device_addr;
63 
64  } stream_instruction_copy_1D_t;
65 
66  typedef struct stream_instruction_copy_2D_t
67  {
68  size_t m;
69  size_t n;
70  size_t sizeof_type;
71  memory_replica_view_t dst_device_view;
72  memory_replica_view_t src_device_view;
73 
74  } stream_instruction_copy_2D_t;
75 
76  /* kernel : to launch kernel on the device */
77  typedef struct stream_instruction_kernel_t
78  {
79  // arguments are:
80  // stream_t * istream, stream_instruction * instr, stream_instruction_counter_t idx)
81  void (*launch)();
82  void * vargs;
83  } stream_instruction_kernel_t;
84 
85  /* read/write files */
86  typedef struct stream_instruction_file_t
87  {
88  int fd;
89  void * buffer;
90  size_t n;
91  size_t offset;
92  } stream_instruction_file_t;
93 
94  /* instructions */
95  typedef struct stream_instruction_t
96  {
97  stream_instruction_type_t type;
98  callback_t callback;
99  union
100  {
101  stream_instruction_copy_1D_t copy_1D;
102  stream_instruction_copy_2D_t copy_2D;
103  stream_instruction_kernel_t kern;
104  stream_instruction_file_t file;
105  };
106  bool completed;
107 
108  } stream_instruction_t;
109 
110 XKRT_NAMESPACE_END
111 
112 #endif /* __STREAM_INSTRUCTION_H__ */
